EmailTemplate.description: Contact owner and partner contact should receive a notification one week before it expires and then again on the day that it expires.
EmailTemplate.name: 6A. Partner Contact Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Lead Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Partner_Contact__c}, Your lead registration for {!Contact.Name} and {!Account.Name} is about to expire, as we have not received any activity updates from you. If you are continuing to pursue this prospect, please document your activities on the lead as a task through the Partner Community, within the next week. You can log a task by clicking on the name, click on Related tab and click new task. To view the lead, click here {!Contact.Link} The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
Follow us!
